content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some gunfights which brings to killing some humanoid robots or cyborgs, maybe humans too depending on the game-mode. There is nothing too extreme, the most violent can go to blood splatters on death but it can be disabled from the game's options.

short_description: This is the official demo for Krytix the game currently in development, this demo features basic features and mechanics such as movement, shooting and the main feel of the gameplay style of the game.
